xml.Title: The e-mail input field for the "leave a review" form is unavailable
xml.Steps: <1.>Go to the "about the company" page on the website http://www.etotest.tu/about-us</1.> <2.>Open the "leave a review" form</2.> <3.>Move the cursor to the E-mail field</3.>
xml.Expected: The "e-mail" field is available for entering characters. The cursor appears.
xml.Actual: The "e-mail" field is not available for entering characters. The cursor does not appear.
